removal_success: Email address {{email}} removed from the key directory
verify_key_comment: Use Mailvelope/PGP to decrypt the message and click the link
verify_key_text:
Hello {name},

please verify your email address {email} by clicking on the following link:

{link}

After verification of your email address, your public key is available in our key directory.

You can find more info at {host}.

Greetings from the Mailvelope Team
verify_removal_text:
Hello {name},

please verify removal of your email address {email} from our key server ({host}) by clicking on the following link:

{link}

Greetings from the Mailvelope Team
